cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.SI. 

The paper discusses the use of computational methods to study framing in public discussions, specifically in the context of the GMO debates. This involves analyzing the language used in pro- and anti-GMO articles, with a focus on whether they adopt a "scientific" tone. This topic is relevant to several sub-fields within computer science, including natural language processing (cs.CL), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), machine learning (cs.LG), information retrieval (cs.IR), and social media analysis (cs.SI).
